articles.title: Khaya Sithole | BELA Act: Once again, SA's courts may have to do what politicians can't
articles.description: As the threat of litigation looms large over a particularly contentious piece of legislation, the price of concessionary politics becomes clear: the judiciary may once again be forced to help the political process find its way, writes Khaya Sithole.
